frameDefinitions: An Agent who is engaged in an Undertaking accords a Degree of importance to a Consideration that influences the success of an Undertaking.
A Cognizer introduces a New_idea into society.
An Agent alters some Material in some useful way by means of some chemical or physical Alterant.
An Agent adjusts an Instrument to enable it to interact directly with a difficult-to-access Target_location.
An Agent wants to achieve a Goal,  or an object.
frameExamples: Our company <t>emphasizes</t> marketing tried and true products and services.INI
It is difficult to imagine how different our lives would be without Edison's <t>invention</t> of the light bulb.
Native Americans <t>dyed</t> textiles with dyes made from cedar strips.
If you <t>aim</t> your weapons somewhere else , I 'll be more likely to talk .
The modest American <t>goal</t> of a threefold increase in capacity recognises this fact .
listRoleDefinitions: An event or state of affairs, an attribute, or an entity whose properties have the potential to influence the success of the <fen>Agent</fen>'s <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the individual who devotes time, concentration, or other resources to a <fen>Consideration</fen> that is important for the success of a larger <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The <fen>Competing_consideration</fen> is another factor that is relevant to the <fen>Undertaking</fen> to which the <fen>Agent</fen> devotes less attention or effort.
The <fen>Artifact</fen> is a physical object designed with some <fen>Consideration</fen> in mind, such that it functions to facilitate the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The <fen>Action</fen> is performed with importance placed on the <fen>Consideration</fen>.
The time period during which the <fen>Agent</fen> attaches a specified degree of importance to the <fen>Consideration</fen> to further the success of the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The location in which the <fen>Agent</fen> attaches the specified level of importance  to the <fen>Consideration</fen>.
The <fen>Cognizer</fen> comes up with or conceptualizes the <fen>New_idea</fen>. It is normally expressed as an External Argument:
The <fen>New_idea</fen> is a concept not previously present in society which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> introduces.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> comes up with the <fen>New_idea</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Cognizer</fen> comes up with the <fen>New_idea</fen>.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is a person who applies the Process to the Material.
The <fen>Alterant</fen> causes a change in the <fen>Material</fen>.
The <fen>Material</fen> is altered by the <fen>Agent</fen> in some useful way.
The point in time or period during which the treatment of the <fen>Material</fen> takes place.
The location in which the <fen>Material</fen>s are processed, often a purpose-built facility such as a tannery or water treatment plant.
The individual that manipulates the <fen>Instrument</fen> to enable interaction with the <fen>Targeted</fen>.
The <fen>Targeted</fen> is the entity located in an indirectly accessible location relative to the <fen>Agent</fen>.
The object manipulated by the <fen>Agent</fen> in order to interact with the <fen>Targeted</fen>.
The location that the <fen>Agent</fen> wishes to ready the <fen>Instrument</fen> to access.
The <fen>Activity</fen> is undertaken by the <fen>Agent</fen> and is directed towards the <fen>Targeted</fen> or <fen>Target_location</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> takes aim.
The place where the <fen>Agent</fen> aims at the <fen>Targeted</fen>.
The volitional actor who intends to achieve a goal.
The action or state of affairs that the Agent wants to achieve.
A <fen>Means</fen> is an object or action that is used or designed to achieve a particular <fen>Goal</fen>.
This role marks expressions that indicate an <fen>Attribute</fen> for which it is the <fen>Agent</fen>'s goal that it have or reach a particular <fen>Value</fen> .
This role marks expressions that indicate which <fen>Value</fen> the <fen>Agent</fen> wants the <fen>Attribute</fen> to reach.
This Frame Element expresses a time period during which an <fen>Agent</fen> had a particular <fen>Goal</fen>.
listRoleExamples: The ICBL has prioritised <fex>working to achieve universalisation of the Mine Ban Treaty in South Asia by 2004</fex>.
Dell said Friday <fex>the company</fex> will put more emphasis on selling software
Monophysite Christians  emphasized Christ's divinity <fex>over his humanity</fex>.
Water is a scarce commodity on French Island so <fex>the guest house</fex> places strong emphasis on water conservation.
Result Oriented <fex>Management</fex>
<fex>In the 1960s</fex> Foucault placed great weight on the notion of archeology.
<fex>In Arizona</fex> we emphasize western bats with a special focus on species identification.
<fex>Kim Sung</fex> invented cinnamon cheez fries in 1988.
The strong gravitic shield was discovered <fex>in 2162</fex>.
Was the light bulb invented <fex>in Austria</fex>?
Stu treated <fex>the lumber</fex> with magical waterproofing fairydust.
I tried to target <fex>his left thigh</fex> .
If you target <fex>towards the bridge</fex> , make sure to avoid the church .
<fex>The attack</fex> targeted a village south of here.
<fex>Microsoft 's</fex> goal of delivering a million copies in the first year is trifling compared to the 25 million copies of Windows it has shipped since May 1990.
The company missed its goal <fex>of getting a thousand third-party software packages shipped</fex>.
The goal <fex>of treatment</fex> was to lower diastolic blood pressure below 85 mm  Hg .
We exceeded our <fex>production</fex> target of 2000 units
GM has a production target <fex>of 2,000,000 units</fex>
But the main goal <fex>of the 1990s</fex> could be to transform a big , heavily armed standing army into a more flexible force

passageCandidateSpans.text: the United States Department of State

sourceCandidateSpans.text: at least a million U.S. dollars
Taylor, Rusk for Johnson, McNamara for Gilpatric
